website_summaries.verdict: An expansive nursery care kit that even features a machine to calm your baby and promote sleep.
pros: We love the portable white noise machine to soothe your baby, which conveniently clips anywhere
Nursery care kit includes 10 grooming and medicinal essentials, all constructed out of safe silicone and polyethylene
Products are impressively durable and recyclable
cons: More expensive set than others due to the addition of the white noise machine

customer_reviews.title: she loved it. Baby is due in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Bought for baby shower, she loved it. Baby is due in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Neat set!
customer_reviews.text: Love the portable white noise machine that comes with it
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase would order from you again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and safe product for babies
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be the perfect gift for baby showers. So many useful tools in one set. I bought this as a gift for my new niece and her mom says she loves it! The nail clipper is pretty sharp, ought to be careful. I tested the thermometer and it looks accurate. The brush was nice soft that my neice enjoys when her mom brushes her head and back. The comb has cute little bubbles at it's ends so that it won't scratch when combing. Overall, it's very good designed and well cared product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nora

customer_reviews.title: Chepa
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product and didn’t open it. It looks like a kids toy. Everything looks cheap and seriously like something you’d get with a kids play set.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra :)

customer_reviews.title: Unknown
customer_reviews.text: I have received the product but my baby isn't due till Sept.. so we shall see! Good reviews so hoping it holds up to them.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound machine! The thermometer did not work but everything else was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The Complete Baby Kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit because it does have every thing I need for my baby, complete grooming set for hair and nails, also the medical set to give vitamins and medicine with the most important part thermometer as a parent we are so worry about our baby health and always check his temperature. The second part of this amazing kit is the white noise machine, this machine made me fall in sleep, hahaha. It comes with 5 different sounds in addition to an option to save your baby favourite sound. My recommendation goes with this high quality product which is 2 in 1.
customer_reviews.author: MoKha

customer_reviews.title: I completely liked this product
customer_reviews.text: I completely liked this product! It includes the essentials and the quality is very good! The scissors are sharp enough to cut baby's nails. It is often a problem to find good scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made product for the price. Kind of embarrassed to give this as a gift. The word "Parents" was slaughtered on the packaging. This looks like a gift you would give a little girl for her dolls. Wish I went with Safety First. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Halonagirl

customer_reviews.title: Comes with all you see but need a bag
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! I was hoping however it came with a little bag to put it all in but for what I got for the price I can’t really complain at all!! It’s wonderful!! I couldn’t even get this at Wal-Mart this cheap with everything this has!! 😍☺️
customer_reviews.author: Dana

product_meta.title: ZmZm Deep Sleep And Grooming Kit For Newborns, Infants & Toddlers. Smart Interactive Soother With Cry Sensor & Healthcare Kit (Bundle-11 items:1 Baby Soother + 10 Pcs Baby Nursery kit)-Blue
product_meta.description:
ZmZm Grooming Set:

 * Whether at home or on the go, ZmZm Grooming set gives Momand Dad all the comprehensive assortment of care essentials they need. It'sgreat in to keep available in the nursery, or to take along with you for longertrips. 
 * Grooming kit made with safe designs, and from safe silicone& polyethylene.
 * Essential 10 pieces cover your needs for the first year as anew parent, including a thermometer, hairbrush, hair comb, nail clippers, nailscissors, nasal aspirator, nose cleaning tweezers, medicine dropper, nail fileand finger brush (Gum massager).
 * Details specially designed for maximum care - round-tipscissors, non-scratch comb, anti-slip clippers and stainless-steel scissors.
 * Suitable gift for first time moms & baby first aid kit.
 * Durable & recyclable
feature_bullets: ✔️ ARE YOU TIRED OF THE SLEEPLESS NIGHTS THAT COME WITH BEING A NEW PARENT? ✅YOU & YOUR BABY CAN FINALLY ENJOY AN UNINTERRUPTED NIGHT’S SLEEP! –Don’t remember what it feels like to be well-rested? Help your newborn – and you – finally sleep through the night with ZmZm baby soother, which automatically play a variety of soothing music or noise when it senses any crying sound, will promotes a restful night’s sleep! No more waking up in the middle of the night to shush your crying baby!

✔️ ULTIMATE NURSERY AND GROOMING KIT OF TRICKS✅ with everything you need to keep your new baby healthy and groomed. This complete, 10-piece kit contains a nasal aspirator, digital thermometer, medicine dropper, brush, comb, scissors, nail clipper, fingertip toothbrush and more.

✔️ THIS MOMMY MUST-HAVE WILL ROCK YOUR BABY TO SLEEP ANYWHERE! ✅ Now you can enjoy fuss-free car rides, flights, and walks through the mall! Our sound machine can be easily attached to car seats, strollers, carriers and cribs. Window-shop or grab a coffee with your friends while your infant enjoys a refreshing nap anywhere with (5) sounds: White noise, Birds, Ocean, Rain, Lullabies and Custom Recordings, which lets you record your own message to play the soothing sound of parent's voice.

✔️ YOU’LL WONDER HOW YOU GOT ALONG WITHOUT IT! ✅ As a smart and savvy mom, you need your baby’s products to be durable, safe and long lasting. ZmZm Deep Sleep & Grooming kit was developed based on research by scientists and clinically tested, to offer you the peace of mind you deserve and help your baby fall asleep faster!

✔️✔️✔️ LOOKING FOR THE PERFECT BABY SHOWER GIFT? LOOK NO FURTHER! ✅ Spoil new mommy and daddy with the ZmZm Deep Sleep white sound baby soother, and help them and their newborn get some rest! To show you how confident we are in our baby soother, we back it with our exclusive 30-day full refund guarantee!
